SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
declare @Periodo INT set @Periodo = (select MAX(id_periodo) from AUX_H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS)
/* Actualiza tabla H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS */
INSERT INTO H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS (Id_Periodo , [id_posicion_prestacion] , Id_Tipo_Orden , Nro_Orden , [fecha_proceso_orden] , Id_Origen_Envio_Orden , id_estado_aut_orden , afiliado , subnumero , Secuencia , Id_Persona , [Id_Producto] , [Id_SubProducto] , [Id_Plan_Producto] , [id_forma_pago_orden] , [Id_Estado_Orden] , [id_usuario_carga] , [Id_Usuario_Auditor] , [hora_ingreso_orden] , [valor_orden] , [imp_iva_orden] , [imp_rec_orden] , [imp_rec_iva_orden] , [Fecha_Entrega_Orden] , [cant_ordenes_proces] , [signo_orden] , [Id_Tipo_Envio] , [Id_Usuario_Operador_Auditor] , [Fecha_Autorizacion_Sistema] , [Id_Usuario_Entrega] , [Fecha_Recepcion_Pedido_Medico] , [Fecha_Envio] , [Fecha_Impresion] , [Id_Diagnostico_1] , [Id_Diagnostico_2] , [Id_Diagnostico_3] , [Id_Diagnostico_4] , [Id_Padron] , [Id_Tipo_Beneficiario] , [id_marca_recupero] , [Id_Motivo_Auditoria] , [Fecha_Internacion] , [Fecha_Prescripcion] , Id_Origen_Prestacion , id_replica_orden , id_marca_int_breve , Id_Diagnostico , nro_pedido)
SELECT [Id_Periodo] , [Id_Posicion] , [Id_Tipo_Orden] , [Nro_Orden] , [fecha_proceso_orden] , [Id_Origen_Envio_Orden] , [id_estado_aut_orden] , [afiliado] , [subnumero] , [Secuencia] , [Id_Persona] , [Id_Producto] , [Id_SubProducto] , [Id_Plan_Producto] , [id_forma_pago_orden] , [Id_Estado_Orden] , [id_usuario_carga] , [Id_Usuario_Auditor] , [hora_ingreso_orden] , [valor_orden]/100 , [imp_iva_orden]/100 , [imp_rec_orden]/100 , [imp_rec_iva_orden]/100 , [fec_entrega_orden] , [cant_ordenes_proces] , [signo_orden] , [Id_Tipo_Envio] , [Id_Usuario_Operador_Auditor] , [Fecha_Autorizacion_Sistema] , [Id_Usuario_Entrega] , [Fecha_Recepcion_Pedido_Medico] , [Fecha_Envio],[Fecha_Impresion] , [Id_Diagnostico_1] , [Id_Diagnostico_2] , [Id_Diagnostico_3] , [Id_Diagnostico_4] , 99 as Id_Padron , 99 as Id_Tipo_Beneficiario , [id_marca_recupero] , [Id_Motivo_Auditoria] , [Fecha_Internacion] , [Fecha_Prescripcion] , Id_Origen_Prestacion , id_replica_orden , 0 as id_marca_int_breve , 'Z' as Id_Diagnostico , 0 as nro_pedido FROM [DW_SALUD].[dbo].[AUX_H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS]

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
DECLARE @Periodo Int, @FechaMin CHAR(8), @OPENQUERY nvarchar(4000), @TSQL nvarchar(4000), @Servidor nvarchar(4000), @Query nvarchar(4000) SET @Periodo = (SELECT MAX(id_periodo) FROM AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA) SET @FechaMin = (SELECT dbo.Devuelve_Fecha(dbo.Periodo2MesesAtras(MIN(id_fecha))) -- Toma datos de los ultimos dos periodos de autorizaciones para que no queden afuera ninguna. FROM AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA A JOIN D_PERIODO P on A.id_periodo = P.id_periodo JOIN D_FECHA F on P.id_periodo = F.id_periodo) SET @Servidor = 'HOST03' SET @OPENQUERY = 'SELECT * INTO dw_salud.dbo.TEMP FROM OPENQUERY('+ @Servidor + ',''' SET @TSQL = 'SELECT OW1TOR, OW1POS, F.OW1NOR, OW1NRP, OW1ENF FROM SMPORDD.O01FMOR F INNER JOIN SMPORDD.O03FAUT T ON (F.OW1POS=T.W03POS) AND (F.OW1NRP=T.W03NRP) WHERE OW1FPR >= '+ @FechaMin +''')' SET @Query = @OPENQUERY+@TSQL EXEC (@Query)
--- Crea un indice en la TEMP para optimizar la performance. CREATE nonclustered index [ord_pos_nor] ON dw_salud.dbo.TEMP (OW1TOR,OW1POS,OW1NOR) INCLUDE (OW1NRP, OW1ENF)
/* Actualiza el nro_pedido en tabla AUX_H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS */
UPDATE AUX_H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS SET nro_pedido = T.OW1NRP FROM AUX_H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS H INNER JOIN dw_salud.dbo.TEMP T ON (T.OW1TOR = H.Id_Tipo_Orden AND T.OW1POS = H.id_posicion AND T.OW1NOR = H.Nro_Orden ) WHERE H.id_periodo = @Periodo and H.Nro_Orden <> 0
/* Actualiza el campo id_diagnostico en tabla AUX_H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS */
UPDATE AUX_H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS SET id_diagnostico = T.OW1ENF FROM AUX_H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS H INNER JOIN DW_SALUD.dbo.TEMP T ON (T.OW1TOR = H.Id_Tipo_Orden AND T.OW1POS = H.id_posicion AND T.OW1NOR = H.Nro_Orden AND T.OW1NRP = H.nro_pedido) WHERE H.id_periodo = @Periodo and H.Nro_Orden <> 0
DROP TABLE dw_salud.dbo.TEMP

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destinaton. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection
